item.description:
The plan will be to join Beaver Brook staff on this near full moon night guided walk on Beaver Brook's beautiful trails. They will conclude our night hike with warm cocoa and cookies back in the warmth of Maple Hill Farm. Cost is $10 payable to Beaver Brook Association (Includes use of snowshoes - conditions permitting) You will need to bring a head light or flash light. The program will last approx. 2 hours.

You must call Beaver Brook Association at 603-465-7787 (weekdays from 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.) to register and pre-pay to secure your spot. Please note in your RSVP that you have paid.
See: http://www2.beaverbro... for directions.

Cancellation Policy: If event is cancelled due to bad weather/ bad driving/horrible conditions, Beaver Brook will refund completely or offer people the opportunity to get in the next scheduled class/event. No refunds for no-shows.

~~ Note ~~ This event is not full until you see (15) "Paid" RSVPs on the right hand side.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Barn at Maple Hill Farm
item.name: FAN Hike: Beaver Brook
